input.sentences: this is a beautiful old house .
can you believe it was made in 1672 ?
it has only been refinished once !
and still has all of the same furniture !
this is my sister | she 's awesome .
output.sentences: There once was a beautiful mansion in the south.
It was owned by a large family who cared for it.
They spent many days sitting on the mansion's beautiful front porch.
They loved tea time in the drawing room.
The family was very proud to own such a nice house.
